General.Name: Vaxil Bio Ltd
General.Description: Vaxil Bio Ltd., a biotechnology company, focuses on a novel drug discovery and development platform based on signal peptides for infectious diseases and cancer. The company's lead product is ImMucin that has completed a Phase I/II clinical trial for the treatment of multiple myeloma. It is also developing a tuberculosis vaccine/treatment. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 3400 One First Canadian Place, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5X 1A4
